Constants
keyboard driver constants
KBD_LSHIFT_PRESSED  = 0x2A

the scan code for when the left shift key is pressed

KBD_RSHIFT_PRESSED  = 0x36

the scan code for when the right shift key is pressed

KBD_LSHIFT_RELEASED = 0xAA

the scan code for when the left shift key is released

KBD_RSHIFT_RELEASED = 0xB6

the scan code for when the right shift key is released

KBD_ENTER  = 0x1C

the scan code for when the left enter key is pressed

KBD_BACKSPACE = 0x0E

the scan code for when the left backspace key is pressed

KBD_UP_ARROW = 0x48

the scan code for when the left up arrow is pressed

KBD_DOWN_ARROW  = 0x50

the scan code for when the left down arrow is pressed

KBD_RIGHT_ARROW = 0x4D

the scan code for when the left right arrow is pressed

KBD_LEFT_ARROW  = 0x4B

the scan code for when the left left arrow is pressed

regs

The saved registers for when an interrupt occurs unsigned int gs, fs, es, ds; - segment registers pushed onto the stack unsigned int edi, esi, ebp, ebx, edx, ecx, eax; - general purpose registers pushed onto the stack unsigned int int_no, err_code; - interrupt number and error code unsigned int eip, cs, eflags; - address of instruction which caused the exception, saved code segment, and flags
